personalInfo.name: Mayur Mahajan
personalInfo.title: Python Full-Stack Developer | Android Developer | Web Development Lead
personalInfo.about: And passionate Python Full-Stack Developer and Android Developer specializing in building scalable, user-focused applications. With expertise in React.js, Firebase, REST APIs, and MongoDB, I have delivered 4+ production-ready projects spanning Android apps, web platforms, and automated backend systems. I thrive in Agile environments, leading teams to boost delivery efficiency by 40%. Currently pursuing a B.E. in AI & ML with a CGPA of 9.05/10, I am committed to driving innovation through clean code, modern design principles, and problem-solving that delivers measurable impact.

education.degree: Bachelor of Engineering in Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning
education.institution: P.E.S. Modern College of Engineering, Pune

experience.title: Web Developer Intern
points: Built assessment platform (Apps Script + MongoDB) for 500+ students.
Cut manual effort by 75% via unit testing and JSON-based API flows.
Boosted delivery by 40% in Agile team using Git and modular MVC patterns.
Delivered client portal via WordPress, Elementor, Superio; responsive design for cross-device UX.
